author: youngprince042
content:
Hello everyone, I'm excited to be a part of this community! 

My name is Prince Chisomaga, and I'm a backend engineer with over 5 years of experience in the tech industry. 

I specialize in Node.js, JavaScript, and Typescript, and have extensive experience working with these programming languages. 

In addition, I'm a smart contract developer with 2 years of experience working on blockchain projects, specifically in the Ethereum ecosystem, using Solidity. 

Researching and developing innovative applications using blockchain technology is a passion of mine, and I'm always looking for opportunities to collaborate with others who share this interest. 

Looking forward to getting to know you all!
